reviewText: this is an intensely intermediate level workout that uses a strenght bar(Leisa Hart's is called a Core Bar, I bought it at her website). I also have alternated using hand weights and my body bars i already own. THe Core Bar is by far the best bar i have ever used, but if you don't want to shell out the money for it you can still do this workout and use hand weights, its a great strenght training Core workout and my abs and back and arms are more defined by doing this simple to follow workout. Hart is the best instructor I have every followed, she is good. I like the way this and the FitToTheCore Burn video make me feel toned and firm, yet I don't have aches and pains from doing step or other painful aerobics, this is a great workout.
summary: great core training, simple to follow
Title: N/A

reviewText: I Love This Video! Leisa Hart is my role model in fitness, she looks so great for having two small babies. I adore her style of isntruction. FitToTheCore is a great strenght training video, combining elements of core training with her wighted bar is so unique and effective. I alternate using hand wieghts one day and her bar the next time, and it is great. I see the result, my hubbie is seeing the results when I undress, he claims my body is more fit than ever, and I agree, and it's because of the way i feel doing Leisa Hart's videos.
Title: N/A

reviewText: this is a re'titled FitToTheCore Chisel video that I got, and I absolutely love it....the Core Bar is the best strenght training tool I have used, its adjustable with soft cushioned grips that are so good....the weights snap on and off without a probelem, they are easy to use, unlike other so-called adjusted bars that are screw tops...this is great, leisa's workouts are uniqure and never boring, she is a top trainer and her body is inspirational, and her attitude is motivating. This is a great video, and so is the Burn FitToTheCore, and you'll love her Core Bar if you get it. I love mine!
summary: Core Bar is the best, this weight bar workout is excellent

reviewText: I have enjoyed all of Leisa Hart's videos through the years, expecially the new ones that helped my recent pregnancy. The FitToTheCore videos are really great all-roudn workouts, i really  enjoyed this and the Burn video.

reviewText: I read Gibby Girls review of this DVD and had to respond....she is totally wrong and unfortunately wrote a review that makes no sense. She complained about the Core Bar but doesn't have one. Well, I do, and I LOVE IT! The Core Bar is absotlutely useful in this workout, it gets your balance and focus in line and you feel the effects of the simple moves that generate power in the core muscles. I read other reviews from Gibby Gril, and its apparent she writes alot of negative reviews, really mean. This dvd is well worth it, it is a very sold workout and the Core Bar is a fine piece of fitness equipment.
summary: Core Bar is GREAT, workout is very good too

reviewText: i bought a body bar and video this year and really didn't like the instructor Kelly Roberts, especially after reading that she is unhelathy(belimic, anerexic), plus the video was boring. I then saw Leisa Hart's new Fit To The Core videos and tried them since I love all of her other stuff, and I loved it. I can use my bar, but I am going to buy her CORE BAR and test drive it. This video is video straight forward, toning the upper body and firming up the problem areas of the butt and thighs, the BURN video is also great.
summary: really good routine, bar workout is very intense
Title: N/A

reviewText: i ususally don't write reviews for fitness videos, because they seldom are used by me and my daughter only a few times, but i have simply fallen in love with this strenght training video. My daughter had a baby and used a FitMama Postnatal video starring Leisa Hart, and so we both decided to try her FitToTheCore videos and have really loved the results we have gotten, combining strenght training and cardio. Hart is energetic and positive, and the muscle tone we both now have is due to the fact that Hart keeps us going, she isn't a bully type of coach or an over the top idiot like denise austin or richard simmons, she is very genuine and straight forward. My daughter and I both used dumbbells, and then we got Hart's Core Bar from her website and absolutely loved it. You can change the weight by adding another end piece, so it's very good to have that instant adjustability. If you own a body bar, thats fine, but you would have to own several of them to get the variations. TO sum it up, Leisa Hart's videos are professionally done and wonderfully easy to follow. I suggest you get both the Burn and the Chisel videos, or anything that this woman stars in...we are now lean and mean fans of Leisa Hart, and look forward to her future new videos.
Title: N/A

reviewText: THIS IS A GREAT VIDEO, FANTASTIC CONCEPT. I USED MY BODY BAR FOR RESISTANCE, AND CAN'T WAIT TO GET HART'S CORE BAR THAT IS ADJUSTABLE. THE TONING MOVES ARE INTENSE AND STRAIGHT FORWARD, HARD TO DESCRIBE THIS TYPE OF WORKOUT OTHER THAN IT IS GREAT. THE MOVES MIGHT BE A BIT TAI CHI LIKE COMBINED WITH TRADITIONAL TONING, AND HART IS A GURU AT COMING UP WITH NEW ROUTINES, SHE IS THE BEST. THE VIDEO IS A MUST GET, AS WELL AS FIT TO THE CORE BURN, ANOTHER FANTASTIC VIDEO. I ALSO GOT THE ON THE BALL ABS VIDEO AND LOVED IT, ALL OS HART'S VIDEOS ARE GREAT.

reviewText: The Body Bar workout videos are ok, but they do not compare to this GREAT weight bar workout. Leisa Hart's CORE BAR is the BEST weight training tool i have ever purchased. The Chisel and Burn FotToTheCore videos are very challenging and creative. They both work the entire body, with the Chisel "chiseling" your arms, abs, back, and shoulders. I loved the music and really like Leisa's teaching style.
summary: Core Bar is best weight bar, excellent routine

reviewText: Leisa Hart is an inspiration....she has a great CORE BAR that she uses in these videos....I love her easy to learn and easy to follow choreography....her GYM IN A BOX dvd is incredible, and I combine them to great great great workouts that fit my lifestyle, not some overblown overly loud instructor...Hart is great!!! I have tried TaeBo and the Firms videos, but they are lacking alot....Leisa Hart is ideal for me, I like her stuff alot....and I think others will too....I can't wait for her new videos her website says are coming.

The Core Bar is very reasonable compared to other pieces of fitness equipment, and i always find myself enjoying the next day feeling i get when i do a Leisa Hart video, she makes working out to a home video fun and not boring, she is good and her workouts are too :-)

reviewText: this is a great fat burn and toning video, the Core Bar is the best weight bar i have, and i absolutely love Leisa Hart's teaching style, She is not a hard core instructor, but she's also not a primadonna trying to do stuff that others do, She does her own style, which is different at times, but my body feels it and i am never so sore it hurts, its a fun workout.

reviewText: I got a great burn and even though I don't own the exercise bar, I substitute it w/dumb bells. You achieve the sameburn, if not more. Will purchase more of her dvds in the future.

reviewText: i just did a longer review for the Burn Fit To The Core video, but i wanted to also do  a quick review here and say that i totally loved this video, the workout is quick, efficient and effective. i felt it day one, and still am improving. my goal is to lose 20 more lbs(already lost 15 in 4 weeks mostly from this workout) and i feel confident Hart is the type of video coach that can get me there. i am buying her Core Bar because my dumbbells are no longer heavy enough, but you can do alot with just light weights in this video(my girlfriend use small cans for resistance and it worked, but now she's also buying the core bar)...this is a great tape and should be a part of anyones program, or at least leisa hart should be a part of it, i think she is awesome and i am uplifted by her spirit and guidance...get this video, you'll love it
summary: awesome workout, Hart is an awesome host
Title: N/A

reviewText: Leisa Hart is my new favorite fitness guru, she is so impressive. I loved the way the FTC video was done, and I can't wait to get her Core Bar. I used hand weights, which were fine, but it looked sooo  much better with her Core Bar. i guess you could use a body bar, but hers was pretty cool. The music was great and the toning segments were very tight and intense. I think this video could be an across the board beginners video to an advanced video, it is very flexible. I loved it, and also loved the Fit To The Core Burn video, awesome job once again by Leisa!
summary: awesome toning, great bar workout, LOVED IT!

reviewText: Leisa Hart is fit and chiseled in this video. She works the major muscle groups effectively and quickly. She looks hot and my wife aspires to have a bod like hers, so doing her many videos is our 2004 new years fitness resolution. This body bar workout is fantastic; the FitToTheCore Burn video is just as good, you have to try them both, you will not regret it. If you don't have a body bar or dumbbells, you have to get them, I would suggest buying Leisa's new CoreBar at her site, it is not available here or anyone else and it looks to be perfect for toning the body and doing this video!
summary: instructors body is very fit and chiseled

reviewText: i am hard to please, and it is very nice to say that this workout is very good. I really like the southern charm of the instrucotr Leisa Hart, she is very very good. The moves are easy to learn and take a bit of practice, not soemthing thats easy to do right off the bat, but soemthing that is good for my muscles. i could feel the burn, i could feel my legs working, my arms working, i felt chiseled, this is highly recommended
summary: this is really good, i liked the moves
